author: Mercedes Short
review: Absolutely horrible. I have been a tenant for 1 1/2 years and they have not once answered the phone, returned my calls, answered an email, or resolved any issues. The maintenance team has come in twice and left things in disarray and left

author: Velvet Humphres
review: Its hard to not be frustrated after years of being here. It causes me anxiety to even think about the place, even though I have been moved out since February. The staff are underpaid and overworked. My mail was stolen more than once from

author: idkhonestly haha
review: This place has gone really down hill, the dog waist trash cans are overflowing constantly, there seems to be garbage and dog waist everywhere. Its disgusting and un sanitary! There is almost never any dog waist bags either. There are

author: Marlena Hunsaker
review: The staff is overwhelmingly rude and disorganized. The people living here are shady and hostile. It's definitely not a place I recommend anyone to live. People steal the reserved parking regularly, there's garbage all over the parking lot,

author: Zachary Walls
review: We've lived here for years, the first half was great, the second half wasn't. What changed? The apartments got bought out by a different company. After the take over office hours seemed to be cut in half, and the overworked staff got rude,

author: Aleksander Greenleaf (Alek)
review: Section 8 housing offers a huge tax break. I get it. Cascade Meadows staff work hard for very little pay. They are yelled at every day by some of the craziest people in Bellingham. And they endure. They do their best and I really appreciate

author: Nathan Ash
review: I agree with the negative reviews that seem to be everywhere about cascade meadows. i have been here for years and it gets worse every time. The extremely rude office ladies and a sarcastic and rude maintenance staff. even the most simple

author: Amy Martin
review: This is an awesome place to live. The staff is incredibly friendly and polite. The rent is reasonable and the units come with washer, dryer and dishwashers. LOVE IT HERE!!!

author: Bobby Newbie
review: Do not rent or go near this place! They will take your deposit and shove it. Ruder than heck and poor upkeep. Sense getting bought out, it has been a nightmare and has affected people's renting history sense. Do not rent here at all!

author: Nick Ocean
review: I lived a large portion of my early life here at that time I did not know what to think of it but now I see.all that I actually liked was the office mostly because they had free cookies and a vending machine rarely I would get my way into

author: Lisa Rodriquez
review: Very pretty appartments. Pretty quiet. Moved in there several years ago so I could attend WCC easier.

author: Abigail Darden
review: Extremely nice office manager and most well kept low income housing I've seen, maintenance men are super nice

author: Amy Dodds
review: Nice place never had any problems and it great to be close to everything!

author: Rob Martin
review: Office staff was downright rude when i was inquiring about the complex. Nasty!!!
